text: Francis Sejersted (8 February 1936 - 25 August 2015) was a Norwegian history professor. He was the former chairman of the Norwegian Nobel Committee. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 1989. Sejersted suffered a long illness and died on 25 August 2015 in Oslo, aged 79. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Norway Category:Norwegian academics Category:Norwegian Nobel Committee Category:People from Oslo Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: Francis Sejersted
